nrqlQueries.query: FROM Metric SELECT latest(device_name) as 'Device Name', latest(src_addr) AS 'Device IP', latest(model_number) AS 'Model', latest(serial_number) AS 'Serial', latest(firmware_revision) AS 'Firmware', latest(SysObjectID) AS 'SysObjectID', latest(entity.type) AS 'NR Entity Type', latest(instrumentation.name) AS 'Ktranslate Profile', latest(kentik.snmp.Uptime)/8640000 AS 'Uptime (Days)', latest(timestamp) AS 'Last Update', latest(PollingHealth) AS 'Current Polling Health', if(latest(PollingHealth) = 'GOOD', '', latest(PollingHealthReason)) AS 'Health Reason' WHERE provider = 'kentik-ats'
FROM Metric SELECT latest(atsStatusSourceAStatus) AS 'Source A', latest(atsStatusSourceBStatus) AS 'Source B' WHERE provider = 'kentik-ats'
FROM Metric SELECT max(kentik.snmp.atsOutputCurrent)/10 AS 'Output Load Amps' FACET output_phase_index, output_phase_number WHERE provider = 'kentik-ats' TIMESERIES 2 MINUTES

FROM Metric SELECT latest(atsStatusHardwareStatus) AS 'Hardware Status', latest(atsStatusSwitchStatus) AS 'Switch Status', latest(atsStatusVoltageOutStatus) AS 'Voltage Out Status', latest(atsStatusPhaseSyncStatus) AS 'Phase Sync Status', latest(atsStatusRedundancyState) AS 'Redunancy State', latest(atsStatusOverCurrentState) AS 'Overcurrent State', latest(atsStatus24VPowerSupply) AS 'Source A 24v Power Supply Status', latest(atsStatus24VSourceBPowerSupply) AS 'Source B 24v Power Supply Status', latest(atsStatus5VPowerSupply) AS '5v Power Supply Status', latest(atsStatusPlus12VPowerSupply) AS '+12v Power Supply Status', latest(atsStatusMinus12VPowerSupply) AS '-12v Power Supply Status' WHERE provider = 'kentik-ats'
FROM Metric SELECT max(kentik.snmp.atsOutputPercentLoad) AS 'Output Load %' FACET output_phase_index, output_phase_number WHERE provider = 'kentik-ats' TIMESERIES 2 MINUTES
